**Step 02:** The appraisal and final approval will be done by the Scheme Steering Committee. 
**Step 03:** The performance will be monitored both on quantitative and qualitative aspects by the SSC. In case of a significant shortfall in the progress, the Promoter Agency will be changed and support may be continued to the new agency with the approval of SSC.
